description:
EasyDreams 2.0 New Features:
Add sounds from your music library!  Three new nature sounds!  White noise panel with 6 different white noise sounds!  New timer with support for hours!  Improved audio quality across all sounds!
******************************
EasyDreams plays soothing nature sounds on your Palm Pre or Pixi. Enjoy to nature sounds from around the world. Mix and match all of our high quality sounds to set your mood, start the timer and doze off. Tap the alarm icon and have an alarm wake you from your nap!
******************************
Listen to birds signing in Wallace Falls, people chatting at a park in San Cristobal, a rainstorm in Taiwan, ocean waves in Taipei, a trickling stream in Greece, the chatter of a forest in Taipei, and a train passing near the woods in New Orleans. We are open to requests for more sounds! Send us a message on twitter, @easydreamsapp.
